zone.line: And see, what we not know can!
That will to me near the heart burn.
True am I selected more than all the vulgar
Doctors, Masters, Writers & Priests
Me troubles no scruple nor doubt
Fears me neither for Hell nor the Devil —
For is to me even all friendship delivered
Makes to me not one what right to ?think
Makes to me not one, what I can learn
Men to better & to convert;
Also have I neither good nor money
Nor honour & lordship of the World
It may no dog thus longer to live
Therefore have I me to Magic addicted
If to me thro the spirits craft & mouth
Not much mystery will be known
That I not more with hard labour
To say need, what I not know.
That I percieve what the world
In innermost compartments holds
